sources.name: Federal Election Commission – Certified Results and Filings
sources.description: Official certified federal election results, candidate filings, and independent expenditure reports.
sources.update_frequency: Daily during election periods; certified results after canvass (weeks).
sources.feasibility_notes: Legally authoritative with structured CSV/JSON downloads; lag tied to state certification but reliable for federal races.

sources.name: Associated Press Elections API
sources.description: Real-time and historical race calls across federal and statewide contests.
sources.update_frequency: Minutes during election night; periodic thereafter.
sources.feasibility_notes: Industry-standard feed for rapid projections; requires paid access and integration work.

sources.name: MIT Election Data and Science Lab – Official Returns
sources.description: Aggregated precinct- and county-level results in machine-readable formats.
sources.update_frequency: Released weeks to months after certification.
sources.feasibility_notes: High data quality but slower refresh cadence; excellent for retrospective validation.

sources.name: Nevada election office
sources.description: Certified statewide and county results plus candidate filings.
sources.update_frequency: Nightly during canvass; certification per statutory calendar.
sources.feasibility_notes: Authoritative counts with predictable publication cadence; may require PDF/CSV parsing.

sources.name: Ballotpedia – Nevada elections portal
sources.description: Aggregated election calendars, candidate rosters, and unofficial vote tallies.
sources.update_frequency: Daily during election periods; slower off-cycle.
sources.feasibility_notes: Rich historical context; manual scraping necessary for automated ingestion.

sources.name: Decision Desk HQ Results Feed
sources.description: Paid API for precinct and county level tallies across US states.
sources.update_frequency: Minutes on election night; hourly thereafter.
sources.feasibility_notes: Fast and structured but gated behind subscription and integration work.

sources.name: Election Commission of India – Election Results

sources.update_frequency: Minutes during counting days; final certification after canvass.
sources.feasibility_notes: Structured data with JSON endpoints; uptime maintained during counting.

sources.name: PRS Legislative Research Election Atlas
sources.description: Aggregated results with historical comparisons.
sources.update_frequency: Days after results
sources.feasibility_notes: Excellent for retrospective analysis; not real-time.

sources.name: Reuters Elections Coverage – Unclassified
sources.description: Global wire-service election reporting with near-real-time updates.
sources.update_frequency: Minutes during major elections.
sources.feasibility_notes: Reliable narrative coverage; data extraction requires scraping and manual QA.

sources.name: Local election commission (Unclassified)
sources.description: Official jurisdiction election authority (URL to be verified per contest).
sources.update_frequency: Certification timeline defined by statute.
sources.feasibility_notes: Research required to identify authoritative feed; placeholder for analyst follow-up.

sources.name: UK Electoral Commission – Results and Turnout
sources.description: Official UK parliamentary and local election results with downloadable datasets.
sources.update_frequency: Certified results published within days of counts.
sources.feasibility_notes: Primary authority for certified vote totals; limited to official counts (no projections).

sources.name: BBC Elections Live Results
sources.description: Live constituency-level reporting with history and contextual analysis.
sources.update_frequency: Minutes on election night; archived pages post-event.
sources.feasibility_notes: Timely updates; scraping required for automation and subject to layout drift.

sources.name: Press Association Elections Database
sources.description: Syndicated constituency results feed consumed by major newsrooms.
sources.update_frequency: Real-time on election night.
sources.feasibility_notes: Robust infrastructure with SLA-backed updates; procurement and per-seat pricing required.

sources.update_frequency: Daily during election periods; slower off-cycle.
sources.feasibility_notes: Rich historical context; manual scraping necessary for automated ingestion.

sources.name: Decision Desk HQ Results Feed
sources.description: Paid API for precinct and county level tallies across US states.
sources.update_frequency: Minutes on election night; hourly thereafter.
sources.feasibility_notes: Fast and structured but gated behind subscription and integration work.

sources.name: Reuters Elections Coverage – United Kingdom - London
sources.description: Global wire-service election reporting with near-real-time updates.
sources.update_frequency: Minutes during major elections.
sources.feasibility_notes: Reliable narrative coverage; data extraction requires scraping and manual QA.

sources.name: Local election commission (United Kingdom - London)
sources.description: Official jurisdiction election authority (URL to be verified per contest).
sources.update_frequency: Certification timeline defined by statute.
sources.feasibility_notes: Research required to identify authoritative feed; placeholder for analyst follow-up.

sources.name: North Carolina election office
sources.description: Certified statewide and county results plus candidate filings.
sources.update_frequency: Nightly during canvass; certification per statutory calendar.
sources.feasibility_notes: Authoritative counts with predictable publication cadence; may require PDF/CSV parsing.

sources.name: Elections Canada – Official Voting Results
sources.description: Certified federal election results down to riding level.
sources.update_frequency: Released after official tabulation (days to weeks).
sources.feasibility_notes: Authoritative with CSV and machine-readable formats; slower than media projections.

sources.name: CBC News Elections Dashboard
sources.description: Live results and historical context for federal and provincial races.
sources.update_frequency: Minutes during election night; archived thereafter.
sources.feasibility_notes: Timely but requires scraping or manual download; APIs not public.
